trans-unit.source: Provides data for the layout event for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The layout event occurs when the size or position of the designer or its contained components change.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]布局事件发生时的大小或设计器或其包含的组件的位置更改。

trans-unit.source: The ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs contains the graphics used to make layout changes and the designer theme to use for look and feel.
trans-unit.target: ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs 包含用于进行布局更改和设计器主题要用于外观和感觉的图形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref>使用指定的图形和设计器主题类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used the layout the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> to use for look and feel.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the root workflow.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref>与根工作流相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe designer look and feel properties, such as colors, styles, and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>用于描述设计器的外观属性，如颜色、 样式和背景。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the designer.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.

If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计器具有<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>与它关联，设计器将使用所描述的外观和感觉属性<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>来绘制自身。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>关联设计器中，该设计器将使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>来重绘其外观和感觉属性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to lay out the designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>使用设计器进行布局。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象提供将对象绘制到显示设备上的方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to lay out the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于进行布局设计器的对象。
